sentences.sContent: I'd like to go on a picnic.
A: Would you like to go on a picnic this Sunday morning?
sentences.sContent_eng: A: Would you like to go on a picnic this Sunday morning?
sentences.sCn: 你愿意星期天上午去野餐吗？

sentences.sContent: I don't understand why you want to keep the same book every night...oh,well *sigh* "It was a warm spring day,and the six bunny-wunnies decided to go on a picnic...

sentences.sCn: 真不懂你怎麽每晚都读同一本书...好吧，唉！“温暖的春天�，六只宾尼兔打算去野餐...
